plugin_libraries.library:
<class name="MedianFilterMultiDouble" type="filters::MedianFilter" base_class_type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
THis is a median filter which works on a stream of doubles.

<class name="MeanFilterMultiDouble" type="filters::MeanFilter" base_class_type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
THis is a mean filter which works on a stream of doubles.

<class name="transferFunctionMultiDouble" type="filters::TransferFunctionDoubleFilter" base_class_type="filters::MultiChannelFilterBase">
THis is a transfer filter which works on a stream of doubles.
